structure.unit: ARTICLE XXXVII. MIAMI-DADE WATER AND SEWER DEPARTMENT AND ADVISORY BOARD

text.section:
Sec. 2-343. Membership of Board.
The Water and Sewer Advisory Board shall consist of nine (9) members, each of whom shall be an individual of outstanding reputation, integrity, responsibility and business ability; provided, however, that no person who is an officer or employee of any water or sewer system or company operating within Miami-Dade County, shall be eligible for membership. The members of said Board shall be appointed and serve in accordance with the provisions of Sections,,, and inclusive of the Code of Miami-Dade County.
